description.ro: Zona capului — asociata cu gandirea excesiva, furie, dureri de cap legate de stres
description.en: Head area — associated with overthinking, anger, stress-related headaches

emotionDescription.ro: Presiune sau caldura in cap, asociata cu frustrare intensa sau furie
emotionDescription.en: Pressure or heat in the head, associated with intense frustration or anger

emotionDescription.ro: Tensiune in cap, gandire in cerc, dificultate de concentrare
emotionDescription.en: Tension in the head, racing thoughts, difficulty concentrating

emotionDescription.ro: Tensiune difuza in cap, senzatie de plin, minte agitata
emotionDescription.en: Diffuse head tension, feeling of fullness, restless mind

description.ro: Zona fruntii — legata de concentrare, anxietate, ingrijorare
description.en: Forehead area — linked to concentration, anxiety, worry

emotionDescription.ro: Tensiune in frunte, incretirea sprancenelor, ingrijorare
emotionDescription.en: Forehead tension, furrowed brow, worry

emotionDescription.ro: Presiune in frunte din concentrare prelungita
emotionDescription.en: Forehead pressure from prolonged concentration

emotionDescription.ro: Tensiune persistenta in frunte, anticipare negativa
emotionDescription.en: Persistent forehead tension, negative anticipation

description.ro: Zona ochilor — legata de tristete, plans, surpriza, oboseala emotionala
description.en: Eye area — linked to sadness, crying, surprise, emotional fatigue

emotionDescription.ro: Presiune in spatele ochilor, lacrimi, usturime
emotionDescription.en: Pressure behind the eyes, tears, stinging

emotionDescription.ro: Presiune intensa in jurul ochilor, plans necontrolat
emotionDescription.en: Intense pressure around eyes, uncontrollable crying

emotionDescription.ro: Ochi larg deschisi, furnicaturi, senzatie de alerta
emotionDescription.en: Wide eyes, tingling, sense of alertness

description.ro: Zona maxilarului — legata de furie, suprimare emotionala, tensiune
description.en: Jaw area — linked to anger, emotional suppression, tension

emotionDescription.ro: Inclestrare a maxilarului, scrâsnit din dinti, tensiune
emotionDescription.en: Jaw clenching, teeth grinding, tension

emotionDescription.ro: Maxilar inclestat, cuvinte retinute, controlul exprimarii
emotionDescription.en: Clenched jaw, held-back words, controlling expression

description.ro: Zona gâtului — legata de durere, rusine, suprimare, dificultate de exprimare
description.en: Throat area — linked to grief, shame, suppression, difficulty expressing

emotionDescription.ro: Nod in gât, dificultate de a inghiti, plans retinut
emotionDescription.en: Lump in throat, difficulty swallowing, held-back crying

emotionDescription.ro: Constrictie in gât, dificultate de a vorbi, dorinta de a te ascunde
emotionDescription.en: Throat constriction, difficulty speaking, urge to hide

emotionDescription.ro: Senzatie de blocare in gât, cuvinte retinute
emotionDescription.en: Blocked feeling in throat, words held back

emotionDescription.ro: Gât contractat, senzatie de greata, refuz instinctiv
emotionDescription.en: Contracted throat, nausea sensation, instinctive refusal

description.ro: Zona pieptului — centrul emotional major, asociat cu iubire, anxietate, durere, bucurie, mandrie
description.en: Chest area — major emotional center, associated with love, anxiety, grief, joy, pride

emotionDescription.ro: Constrictie in piept, dificultate de a respira, inima bate rapid
emotionDescription.en: Chest tightness, difficulty breathing, racing heart

emotionDescription.ro: Caldura in piept, senzatie de deschidere, plenitudine
emotionDescription.en: Chest warmth, sense of openness, fullness

emotionDescription.ro: Greutate in piept, senzatie de gol, durere profunda
emotionDescription.en: Chest heaviness, emptiness, deep ache

emotionDescription.ro: Presiune in piept, inima bate tare, respiratie scurta
emotionDescription.en: Chest pressure, pounding heart, shortness of breath

emotionDescription.ro: Senzatie de usurinta in piept, deschidere, energie calda
emotionDescription.en: Lightness in chest, openness, warm energy

emotionDescription.ro: Piept expansiv, senzatie de plenitudine calda
emotionDescription.en: Expansive chest, warm fullness sensation

emotionDescription.ro: Furnicaturi in piept, energie efervescenta, anticipare placuta
emotionDescription.en: Chest tingling, effervescent energy, pleasant anticipation

description.ro: Zona abdominala — al doilea creier, asociat cu instincte, frica, anxietate, dezgust, entuziasm
description.en: Abdominal area — the second brain, associated with gut feelings, fear, anxiety, disgust, excitement

emotionDescription.ro: Nod in stomac, senzatia de gol, fluturi in stomac
emotionDescription.en: Pit in stomach, sinking feeling, butterflies

emotionDescription.ro: Tensiune abdominala, senzatie de nod, neliniste fizica
emotionDescription.en: Abdominal tension, knotted feeling, physical unease

emotionDescription.ro: Greata, stomac rascolit, reflex de vomitare
emotionDescription.en: Nausea, churning stomach, gagging reflex

emotionDescription.ro: Fluturi in stomac, energie nervoasa placuta
emotionDescription.en: Butterflies in stomach, pleasant nervous energy

emotionDescription.ro: Greutate in stomac, senzatie de nod, disconfort persistent
emotionDescription.en: Stomach heaviness, knotted feeling, persistent discomfort

description.ro: Zona umerilor — poarta poveri emotionale, asociata cu stres, tensiune, responsabilitate
description.en: Shoulder area — carries emotional burdens, associated with stress, tension, responsibility

emotionDescription.ro: Umeri ridicati, tensiune cronica, senzatie de povara
emotionDescription.en: Raised shoulders, chronic tension, sense of burden

emotionDescription.ro: Greutate pe umeri, senzatie de a purta lumea pe umeri
emotionDescription.en: Weight on shoulders, feeling of carrying the world

emotionDescription.ro: Tensiune rigida in umeri, postura defensiva
emotionDescription.en: Rigid shoulder tension, defensive posture

description.ro: Zona spatelui superior — asociata cu povara emotionala, tristete, tensiune cronica
description.en: Upper back area — associated with emotional burden, sadness, chronic tension

emotionDescription.ro: Incovoiere, greutate in spate, postura inchisa
emotionDescription.en: Hunching, back heaviness, closed posture

emotionDescription.ro: Tensiune intre omoplatii, senzatie de comprimare
emotionDescription.en: Tension between shoulder blades, compression feeling

description.ro: Zona lombara — asociata cu stres cronic, frica, epuizare, instabilitate
description.en: Lower back area — associated with chronic stress, fear, exhaustion, instability

emotionDescription.ro: Tensiune lombara persistenta, rigiditate, disconfort
emotionDescription.en: Persistent lower back tension, stiffness, discomfort

emotionDescription.ro: Senzatie de instabilitate, slabiciune lombara
emotionDescription.en: Feeling of instability, lower back weakness

emotionDescription.ro: Greutate in spate, oboseala profunda, lipsa de sustinere
emotionDescription.en: Back heaviness, deep fatigue, lack of support

description.ro: Zona mâinilor — exprima actiune, furie (inclestrare), anxietate (tremur), entuziasm
description.en: Hand area — express action, anger (clenching), anxiety (trembling), excitement

emotionDescription.ro: Pumni inclestriti, palme fierbinti, impuls de a lovi
emotionDescription.en: Clenched fists, hot palms, urge to strike

emotionDescription.ro: Tremur, furnicaturi, palme transpirate, neliniste
emotionDescription.en: Trembling, tingling, sweaty palms, restlessness

emotionDescription.ro: Furnicaturi in degete, energie in maini, dorinta de actiune
emotionDescription.en: Finger tingling, hand energy, urge for action

emotionDescription.ro: Maini amortitin lipsa de senzatie, deconectare
emotionDescription.en: Numb hands, lack of sensation, disconnection

description.ro: Zona bratelor — exprima energie, dorinta de actiune sau retragere
description.en: Arm area — express energy, desire for action or withdrawal

emotionDescription.ro: Brate usoare, dorinta de a imbratisa, energie libera
emotionDescription.en: Light arms, desire to embrace, free energy

emotionDescription.ro: Brate grele, lipsa de energie, dorinta de retragere
emotionDescription.en: Heavy arms, lack of energy, desire to withdraw

emotionDescription.ro: Tensiune in brate, dorinta de a actiona, energie agresiva
emotionDescription.en: Arm tension, urge to act, aggressive energy

description.ro: Zona picioarelor — asociata cu energie, dorinta de fuga, neliniste, stabilitate
description.en: Leg area — associated with energy, urge to flee, restlessness, stability

emotionDescription.ro: Picioare usoare, dorinta de a sari, energie debordanta
emotionDescription.en: Light legs, urge to jump, overflowing energy

emotionDescription.ro: Picioare grele, slabiciune, lipsa de vointa de a te misca
emotionDescription.en: Heavy legs, weakness, lack of will to move

emotionDescription.ro: Neliniste in picioare, dorinta de a fugi, tremur
emotionDescription.en: Restless legs, urge to flee, trembling

emotionDescription.ro: Picioare tremurande, senzatie de a fi paralizat, slabiciune
emotionDescription.en: Trembling legs, feeling paralyzed, weakness

description.ro: Zona talpilor — legata de impamantrare, conexiune cu prezentul, deconectare
description.en: Feet area — linked to grounding, connection with the present, disconnection

emotionDescription.ro: Senzatie de stabilitate, conectare cu pamantul, prezenta
emotionDescription.en: Feeling of stability, earth connection, presence

emotionDescription.ro: Furnicaturi in talpi, dorinta de a fugi, neliniste
emotionDescription.en: Tingling in feet, urge to run, restlessness

emotionDescription.ro: Amorteala in talpi, senzatie de plutire, deconectare de corp
emotionDescription.en: Feet numbness, floating sensation, body disconnection
